newsitem.title: USA: Last August loader of Cusiana sold to U.S. refiner.
newsitem.headline: Last August loader of Cusiana sold to U.S. refiner.

text.p: Colombia's state oil company Ecopetrol sold a Cusiana cargo loading August 19-23 to a U.S. refiner, rounding out the month's program, traders said on Thursday.
The 550,000 barrel cargo was placed at 80-85 cents under October West Texas Intermediate/Cushing, traders said.
Earlier in the day, equity producer Total placed another Cusiana loading August 27-31 at 78 cents under WTI/Cushing.
Ecopetrol placed two other Cusiana cargoes on Wednesday at around October WTI/Cushing minus 82 cents a barrel.
These were the last shipments in the August program of 10 cargoes, including a cross-month cargo loading August 29 to September 2.
The September program is due out around July 25.
